attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why, in today's society, where more and more youngsters are committing crimes are they allowed to remain anonymous?  

Anyone who has the evil- or nastiness to commit acts of violence, theft, abuse or to film such crimes etc. does not deserve to have their anonimity protected.  If they feel big or brave enough to act out their impulses they deserve to be named and shamed.
